38 namespace cinder {
39 
40 class StreamBase : private boost::noncopyable {
41  public:
42  virtual ~StreamBase() {}
43 
44  enum Endianness { STREAM_BIG_ENDIAN, STREAM_LITTLE_ENDIAN };
45 
47  static uint8_t getNativeEndianness()
48 #ifdef CINDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
49  { return STREAM_LITTLE_ENDIAN; }
50 #else
51  { return STREAM_BIG_ENDIAN; }
52 #endif
53 
55  const fs::path& getFileName() const { return mFileName; }
57  void setFileName( const fs::path &aFileName ) { mFileName = aFileName; }
58 
60  bool getDeleteOnDestroy() const { return mDeleteOnDestroy; }
62  void setDeleteOnDestroy( bool enable = true ) { mDeleteOnDestroy = enable; }
63 
65  virtual off_t tell() const = 0;
66 
68  virtual void seekAbsolute( off_t absoluteOffset ) = 0;
69 
71  virtual void seekRelative( off_t relativeOffset ) = 0;
72 
73  protected:
74  StreamBase() : mDeleteOnDestroy( false ) {}
75 
76  fs::path mFileName;
77  bool mDeleteOnDestroy;
78 };
79 
80 class OStream : public virtual StreamBase {
81  public:
82  virtual ~OStream() {}
83 
85  void write( const std::string &s ) { writeData( s.c_str(), s.length() + 1 ); }
86  void write( const fs::path &p ) { writeData( p.string().c_str(), p.string().length() + 1 ); }
87  template<typename T>
88  void write( T t ) { IOWrite( &t, sizeof(T) ); }
89  template<typename T>
90  void writeEndian( T t, uint8_t endian ) { if ( endian == STREAM_BIG_ENDIAN ) writeBig( t ); else writeLittle( t ); }
91  template<typename T>
92  void writeBig( T t );
93  template<typename T>
94  void writeLittle( T t );
95 
96  void write( const Buffer &buffer );
97  void writeData( const void *src, size_t size );
98 
99  protected:
100  OStream() : StreamBase() {}
101 
102  virtual void IOWrite( const void *t, size_t size ) = 0;
103 };
104 
105 
106 typedef std::shared_ptr<class OStream> OStreamRef;
107 
108 class IStream : public virtual StreamBase {
109  public:
110  virtual ~IStream() {};
111 
112  template<typename T>
113  void read( T *t ) { IORead( t, sizeof(T) ); }
114  template<typename T>
115  void readEndian( T *t, uint8_t endian ) { if ( endian == STREAM_BIG_ENDIAN ) readBig( t ); else readLittle( t ); }
116  template<typename T>
117  void readBig( T *t );
118  template<typename T>
119  void readLittle( T *t );
120 
122  void read( std::string *s );
123  void read( fs::path *p );
124  void readFixedString( char *t, size_t maxSize, bool nullTerminate );
125  void readFixedString( std::string *t, size_t size );
126  std::string readLine();
127 
128  void readData( void *dest, size_t size );
129  virtual size_t readDataAvailable( void *dest, size_t maxSize ) = 0;
130 
131  virtual off_t size() const = 0;
132  virtual bool isEof() const = 0;
133 
134  protected:
135  IStream() : StreamBase() {}
136 
137  virtual void IORead( void *t, size_t size ) = 0;
138 
139  static const int MINIMUM_BUFFER_SIZE = 8; // minimum bytes of random access a stream must offer relative to the file start
140 };
141 typedef std::shared_ptr<IStream> IStreamRef;

154 class IStreamFile : public IStream {
155  public:
157  static IStreamFileRef create( FILE *file, bool ownsFile = true, int32_t defaultBufferSize = 2048 );
158  ~IStreamFile();
159 
160  size_t readDataAvailable( void *dest, size_t maxSize );
161 
162  void seekAbsolute( off_t absoluteOffset );
163  void seekRelative( off_t relativeOffset );
164  off_t tell() const;
165  off_t size() const;
166 
167  bool isEof() const;
168 
169  FILE* getFILE() { return mFile; }
170 
171  protected:
172  IStreamFile( FILE *aFile, bool aOwnsFile = true, int32_t aDefaultBufferSize = 2048 );
173 
174  virtual void IORead( void *t, size_t size );
175  size_t readDataImpl( void *dest, size_t maxSize );
176 
177  FILE *mFile;
178  bool mOwnsFile;
179  size_t mBufferSize, mDefaultBufferSize;
180  std::shared_ptr<uint8_t> mBuffer;
181  off_t mBufferOffset; // actual offset to do IO from; incremented by IO
182  off_t mBufferFileOffset; // beginning of the buffer in the file
183  mutable off_t mSize;
184  mutable bool mSizeCached;
185 };

251 class IStreamMem : public IStream {
252  public:
254  static IStreamMemRef create( const void *data, size_t size );
255  ~IStreamMem();
256 
257  size_t readDataAvailable( void *dest, size_t maxSize );
258 
259  void seekAbsolute( off_t absoluteOffset );
260  void seekRelative( off_t relativeOffset );
262  off_t tell() const;
264  off_t size() const { return static_cast<off_t>( mDataSize ); }
265 
267  bool isEof() const;
268 
270  const void* getData() { return reinterpret_cast<const void*>( mData ); }
271 
272  protected:
273  IStreamMem( const void *aData, size_t aDataSize );
274 
275  virtual void IORead( void *t, size_t size );
276 
277  const uint8_t *mData;
278  size_t mDataSize;
279  size_t mOffset;
280 };

308 // This class is a utility to save and restore a stream's state
309 class IStreamStateRestore {
310  public:
311  IStreamStateRestore( IStream &aStream ) : mStream( aStream ), mOffset( aStream.tell() ) {}
312  ~IStreamStateRestore() {
313  mStream.seekAbsolute( mOffset );
314  }
315 
316  private:
317  IStream &mStream;
318  off_t mOffset;
319 };

341 #ifndef __OBJC__
342 class cinder_stream_source {
343  public:
344  typedef char char_type;
345  typedef boost::iostreams::source_tag category;
346 
347  cinder_stream_source( cinder::IStreamRef aStream ) : mStream( aStream ) {}
348 
349  std::streamsize read( char *s, std::streamsize n )
350  {
351  if( mStream->isEof() )
352  return -1;
353 
354  return (std::streamsize)mStream->readDataAvailable( s, (size_t)n );
355  }
356 
357  protected:
358  IStreamRef mStream; // a little kludgy but this is for convenience
359 };
360 
361 typedef boost::iostreams::stream<cinder_stream_source> cinder_istream;
362 
363 class cinder_stream_sink {
364  public:
365  typedef char char_type;
366  typedef boost::iostreams::sink_tag category;
367 
368  cinder_stream_sink( OStreamRef aStream ) : mStream( aStream ) {}
369 
370  std::streamsize write( const char *s, std::streamsize n )
371  {
372  mStream->writeData( s, (size_t)n );
373  return n;
374  }
375 
376  protected:
377  OStreamRef mStream;
378 };
379 
380 typedef boost::iostreams::stream<cinder_stream_sink> cinder_ostream;
381 
382 class cinder_stream_bidirectional_device {
383  public:
384  typedef char char_type;
385  typedef boost::iostreams::seekable_device_tag category;
386 
387  cinder_stream_bidirectional_device( cinder::IoStreamRef aStream ) : mStream( aStream ) {}
388 
389  std::streamsize read( char *s, std::streamsize n )
390  {
391  return static_cast<std::streamsize>( mStream->readDataAvailable( s, (size_t)n ) );
392  }
393 
394  std::streamsize write( const char *s, std::streamsize n )
395  {
396  mStream->writeData( s, (size_t)n );
397  return n;
398  }
399 
400  boost::iostreams::stream_offset seek( boost::iostreams::stream_offset off, std::ios_base::seekdir way)
401  {
402  if( way == std::ios_base::beg ) {
403  mStream->seekAbsolute( (off_t)off );
404  }
405  else if( way == std::ios_base::cur ) {
406  mStream->seekRelative( (off_t)off );
407  }
408  else { // way == std::ios_base::end
409  mStream->seekAbsolute( -(off_t)off );
410  }
411  return mStream->tell();
412  }
413 
414  protected:
415  IoStreamRef mStream;
416 };
417 
418 typedef boost::iostreams::stream<cinder_stream_bidirectional_device> cinder_iostream;
419 
420 #endif // ! __OBJC__
421 
422 } // namespace cinder
